0 => "1100 0 011 00000000", --LD  R3,0x00
1 => "1100 0 100 00000000", --LD  R4,0x00
2 => "0100 1 000 00000000", --MOV A, zero
3 => "1000 0 100 00000000", --ADD A, R4
4 => "1000 0 011 00000000", --ADD A, R3
5 => "0100 0 100 00000000", --MOV R4, A
6 => "0100 1 011 00000000", --MOV A, R3
7 => "1000 1 000 00000001", --ADDI A, 0x01
8 => "0100 0 011 00000000", --MOV R3, A
9 => "1100 0 101 00011110", --LD  R5,0x1E
10 => "0001 0 101 00000000", --CMP A, R5
11 => "1110 0 010 11110111", --BLT -9
12 => "0100 1 000 00000000", --MOV A, zero
13 => "1000 0 100 00000000", --ADD A, R4
14 => "0100 0 101 00000000", --MOV R5, A
